content.raw: I'll merge this, then merge the inverted DO PR, and tag the result as version 2.6. If there are no problems once BLACS starts using labscript_utils.connections, then we can leave the version requirement the same. Otherwise we'll have to fix issues with labscript_utils.connections and bump the version further.
content.html: I'll merge this, then merge the inverted DO PR, and tag the result as version 2.6. If there are no problems once BLACS starts using labscript_utils.connections, then we can leave the version requirement the same. Otherwise we'll have to fix issues with labscript_utils.connections and bump the version further.
